pages.text: While the shovel sees little use normally, the ability of the $(item)Soul Alloy Shovel$() will likely become your best friend. When used it will seek out any items around and bring them back to you. You are able to slot a $(item)Soul Alloy Shovel$() with $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering#aspect_gems)Aspect Gems$(), which improves the shovel in certain aspects:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the pace when you are digging with the shovel. Stacks with efficiency.$()$(br)

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Increases the loot found when digging up treasure. Stacks with fortune.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Literally increases the scope of where you dig. Increases by 1 block per gem.$()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a small amount of durability when using the tool. Stacks with unbreaking.
